newsitem.title: JAPAN: Foreigners net buyers of Japanese stocks in week.
newsitem.headline: Foreigners net buyers of Japanese stocks in week.

text.p: Foreigners were net buyers of Japanese stocks on the Tokyo, Osaka and Nagoya stock exchanges in the week of March 10 to March 14, exchange data showed.
The figures, which are rounded, are as follows:
Previous week net buying 79.62 billion yen
